name: manual-inventory-sort
title: Manual Inventory Sorting
author: TheRustyKnife
description:
Makes some tweaks to the way inventory sorting works.
You can sort your inventory on demand or toggle auto-sort. It's even possible to auto-sort just a part of the inventory.
Hotkeys are supported.
Now with chest support!
description_original:
Makes some tweaks to the way inventory sorting works.
